# Monorepo Builder (PHAR)

This project automatically builds and publishes a dependency-free PHAR version of [symplify/monorepo-builder](https://github.com/symplify/monorepo-builder).

## Why?

To resolve dependency conflicts when using `symplify/monorepo-builder` in your project.

## Install

```bash
composer require monorepo-php/monorepo --dev
```

## Usage

For usage instructions, please refer to the original repository:

- [symplify/monorepo-builder](https://github.com/symplify/monorepo-builder)
